description: The PM will govern with far-left Podemos - a historic move - after winning by just two MPs' votes.

maintext: She said MP Tom¨¢s Guitarte of the small Teruel Existe party had suffered so much pressure that he concealed his whereabouts out of fear. She said he had received more than 8,000 emails urging him to vote "no" instead of "yes".
